author: AntumDeluge
long_description:
### Description:

A mod that allows players to hide their nametags from view.

### Licensing:

- [MIT](https://github.com/AntumMT/mod-hidename/blob/master/LICENSE.txt)

### Usage:

###### Chat commands:

```
/nametag [command]
- commands:
	- hide: sets nametag hidden
	- show: sets nametag visible
	- status: prints the visible/hidden state of nametag (default)

/hidename
- alias for `/nametag hide`

/showname
- alias for `/nametag show`
```

###### Settings:

```
hidename.use_alpha
- use alpha color level to hide nametag instead of clearing text
- type: bool
- default: false
```

### Mod Compatibility:

- [![invisibility](https://content.minetest.net/packages/TenPlus1/invisibility/shields/title/)](https://content.minetest.net/packages/TenPlus1/invisibility/) (won't try change nametag while invisible)
- [![invisible](https://content.minetest.net/packages/AiTechEye/invisible/shields/title/)](https://content.minetest.net/packages/AiTechEye/invisible/) (won't unhide nametag if hidden before sneak)
